name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: بندرآزاد خریدی ساده تر از Amazon و Aliexpress

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: بندر آزاد مسیر اصلی خرید از آمازون امارات و آمریکا و علی اکسپرس چین ، خریدی ساده و ارزان از آمازون امارات و آمریکا و علی اکسپرس چین

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An add-on for easy shopping from Amazon and a reference to the technical information page of the product in Farsi language
The link of the desired product is sent to our site, then the information of that product, if it is available in the data banks, will be returned along with the price of the product + our service fees, and if the user clicks on the received link, it will be returned to the technical information page of the product in Persian language

By using this add-on, you agree to the bandarazad Terms & Conditions available at:
https://bandarazad.com/chrome-plugin-rules/
